meanings.def: a small symbol on a computer or smartphone screen that represents a program or a file
examples: Click on the printer icon with the mouse.
Tap the app icon on your phone to open it.
Did you click on the icon next to the name of the file?
I dragged the icon into the recycle bin.

meanings.def: a famous person or thing that people admire and see as a symbol of a particular idea, way of life, etc.
examples: Madonna and other pop icons of the 1980s
a feminist/gay icon (= somebody that feminists/gay people admire)
Sandra has become a style icon, for the fashion world particularly.

meanings.def: a painting or statue of a holy person that is also thought of as a holy object
